line_1: There the soft Flute his nimble Fingers ply'd,
line_2: While his lov'd Dog sat list'ning by his Side.

line_1: " When first "— (he so began) —" my trade I plied,
Yet while the busy means are ply'd,
line_2: Ev'n when the wished end's deny'd,

line_1: The guardians yield, by force superior ply'd;
line_2: By Int'rest, Prudence; and by Flatt'ry, Pride.

line_1: While the shrill Pipe her slender Fingers ply'd,
line_2: The Pipe you gave her, and your Heart beside.
